summary: Food and drinks restore health and stamina 5x more.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff7700]Details:[/color]
Re-release and overworked version of the mod ive made some time ago.

Besides that you get 5x more health and stamina, i have also added a recipe for butter. You can use one jug of milk for 3x butter at the cooking pot.

There is an additional version where salt is still required for soups and meat. Bread and baked food still needs salt cus thats how it works, right?

Main file is without salt for meats and soups.

If i have left one food out, let me know in the comments.

[color=#ff7700]Installation:[/color]
Install manually or with NMM.

All DLC foods are covered so you need the dlcs.

[color=#ff7700]Compatibility:[/color]
Compatible with iNeed. Put my mod underneath iNeed.
No scripts in this mod so its safe to uninstall and install whenever you please.
author: Alex
